name: Pixel Pong!
description:
[About]
Pixel Pong is a challenging, arcade game that tests your reflexes and mad skills!

[How to Play]
Swipe left and right to bounce the balls off the wall

[Goal]
keep the ball inside the hexagon.

[Features]
1. One Ball - Hexagon
2. One Ball - Octagon
3. Two Balls - Hexagon
4. Two Balls - Octagon
5. Swipe left and right on the screen to move the Hex
6. Don't let the balls escape!
